회원탈퇴

Sorry, membership cancellation is not possible

Due to the following cases, cancellation may not be possible. Please check and try again.

  • Case # 01. If you have an outstanding balance
    - Retry after paying your outstanding balance
  • Case #02. If you are under the service subscription
    - Retry after canceling your subscription
  • Case #03. If other members (other than yourself) exist
    - Retry after transferring the representative right to other member
